# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. We're confident it could make a significant impact in your life or work. For this unique opportunity, I propose a price of $120. This reflects not only the high quality and value of the product but also the exclusive nature of this offer. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
